title: Goodipuse
description: A puzzle set that tastes like a goose at night.

home.title: Home
home.description: What animal sounds like a goose in the morning, looks like a goose at noon, and tastes like a goose at night?

image.title: Base64 Image
image.description: Base64 is a group of similar binary-to-text encoding schemes that represent binary data in an ASCII string format by translating it into a radix-64 representation.

a1z26.title: A1Z26
a1z26.description: A1Z26 is a simple cipher where each letter in the plaintext is replaced by its position in the alphabet.

caesar.title: Caesar
caesar.description: Caesar cipher is a substitution cipher where each letter in the plaintext is shifted a certain number of places down the alphabet.

software.title: External Software
software.description: External software is a software that is not part of the operating system.
